languages.text: Злобная ведьма Кикеросс желает покарать Тервантьяса и лично расправиться с его нов{mf|ым|ой} чемпион{mf|ом|кой} — Вольный Торговцем. Лишь убив ее, Лорд-капитан купит себе драгоценное время для побега из Прорвы.

The malignant Wych Keykeross wants to punish Tervantias and personally deal with his new champion — the Rogue Trader. Killing her is the only way for the Lord Captain to buy precious time to escape the Chasm.
languages.original_text: Злобная ведьма Кикеросс желает покарать Тервантьяса и лично расправиться с его нов{mf|ым|ой} чемпион{mf|ом|кой} — Вольный Торговцем. Лишь убив ее, Лорд-капитан купит себе драгоценное время для побега из Прорвы.

traits.locale_text: The malignant Wych Keykeross wants to punish Tervantias and personally deal with his new champion — the Rogue Trader. Killing her is the only way for the Lord Captain to buy precious time to escape the Chasm.

The malignant Wych Keykeross wants to punish Tervantias and personally deal with his new champion — the Rogue Trader. Killing her is the only way for the Lord Captain to buy precious time to escape the Chasm.

The malignant Wych Keykeross wants to punish Tervantias and personally deal with his new champion — the Rogue Trader. Killing her is the only way for the Lord Captain to buy precious time to escape the Chasm.

languages.text: La pernicieuse Céraste Keykeross veut punir Tervantias et s'occuper personnellement de {mf|son nouveau champion|sa nouvelle championne} : {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. {mf|Ce dernier|Cette dernière} n'a pas d'autre choix que de la tuer afin de gagner du temps en vue de s'échapper de l'Abîme.
languages.original_text: The malignant Wych Keykeross wants to punish Tervantias and personally deal with his new champion — the Rogue Trader. Killing her is the only way for the Lord Captain to buy precious time to escape the Chasm.

traits.locale_text: La pernicieuse Céraste Keykeross veut punir Tervantias et s'occuper personnellement de {mf|son nouveau champion|sa nouvelle championne} : {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. {mf|Ce dernier|Cette dernière} n'a pas d'autre choix que de la tuer afin de gagner du temps en vue de s'échapper de l'Abîme.

languages.text: 恶毒的巫灵绮克萝丝打算惩罚特万提亚斯，亲手杀害他的新任勇士行商浪人。只有杀死绮克萝丝，行商浪人才能争取到足够的时间，逃出裂隙。
languages.original_text: The malignant Wych Keykeross wants to punish Tervantias and personally deal with his new champion — the Rogue Trader. Killing her is the only way for the Lord Captain to buy precious time to escape the Chasm.

traits.locale_text: 恶毒的巫灵绮克萝丝打算惩罚特万提亚斯，亲手杀害他的新任勇士行商浪人。只有杀死绮克萝丝，行商浪人才能争取到足够的时间，逃出裂隙。

languages.text: 悪意あるウィッチ・キーケロスは、テルヴァンティアスを罰して新しい王者である自由開拓者を個人的に始末しようとしている。彼女を殺害することは、ロード・キャプテンが裂け目から脱出するための貴重な時間を稼ぐ唯一の方法なのだ。
languages.original_text: The malignant Wych Keykeross wants to punish Tervantias and personally deal with his new champion — the Rogue Trader. Killing her is the only way for the Lord Captain to buy precious time to escape the Chasm.

traits.locale_text: 悪意あるウィッチ・キーケロスは、テルヴァンティアスを罰して新しい王者である自由開拓者を個人的に始末しようとしている。彼女を殺害することは、ロード・キャプテンが裂け目から脱出するための貴重な時間を稼ぐ唯一の方法なのだ。

languages.text: Die böse Hekatari Keykeross will Tervantias bestrafen und sich persönlich um dessen {mf|neuen Recken zu kümmern — den Freihändler|neue Reckin zu kümmern — die Freihändlerin}. Sie zu töten, ist die einzige Möglichkeit für den Lord Captain, sich wertvolle Zeit für die geplante Flucht aus der Kluft zu erkaufen.
languages.original_text: The malignant Wych Keykeross wants to punish Tervantias and personally deal with his new champion — the Rogue Trader. Killing her is the only way for the Lord Captain to buy precious time to escape the Chasm.

traits.locale_text: Die böse Hekatari Keykeross will Tervantias bestrafen und sich persönlich um dessen {mf|neuen Recken zu kümmern — den Freihändler|neue Reckin zu kümmern — die Freihändlerin}. Sie zu töten, ist die einzige Möglichkeit für den Lord Captain, sich wertvolle Zeit für die geplante Flucht aus der Kluft zu erkaufen.

languages.text: La malvada bruja Keykeross quiere castigar a Tervantias matando personalmente a su nuev{mf|o|a} campe{mf|ón|ona}: {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. Matarla es necesario para ganar el tiempo que necesita {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán para escapar del Abismo.
languages.original_text: The malignant Wych Keykeross wants to punish Tervantias and personally deal with his new champion — the Rogue Trader. Killing her is the only way for the Lord Captain to buy precious time to escape the Chasm.

traits.locale_text: La malvada bruja Keykeross quiere castigar a Tervantias matando personalmente a su nuev{mf|o|a} campe{mf|ón|ona}: {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. Matarla es necesario para ganar el tiempo que necesita {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán para escapar del Abismo.

languages.text: Kötü Viç Keykeross, Tervantias'ı cezalandırmak ve yeni şampiyon Hür Tacir'in icabına şahsen bakmak istiyor. Onu öldürmek, Lord Kaptan'ın Yarık'tan kaçmak için çok değerli vaktini harcamamasının tek yolu.
languages.original_text: The malignant Wych Keykeross wants to punish Tervantias and personally deal with his new champion — the Rogue Trader. Killing her is the only way for the Lord Captain to buy precious time to escape the Chasm.
